name: Advertising
description: Services that deliver advertising, or monitor and track for the purpose of advertising.

name: Audio
description: Services for discovering, watching, recording, performing, or composing audio.

name: Autonomous
description: Services that support the operation or maintenance of connected devices.

name: Business
description: Services that support business such as customer relations, customer support or sales management.

name: Cloud
description: Services for cloud computing, hosting or content delivery.

name: Collaboration
description: Services that enable people to create, share or learn together.

name: Database
description: Services that manage or query a database.

name: Smart Device
description: Services that support Internet-of-Things or home automation devices.

name: Education
description: Services for learning, reference or classroom management.

name: File Transfer
description: Services that store or transfer files.

name: Gaming
description: Services that provide single or multiplayer interactive activities for entertainment purposes.

name: Health & Fitness
description: Services for health and fitness activities.

name: Messaging
description: Services that provide communication between people such as email, instant messaging or video conferencing.

name: Navigation
description: Services that provide information to help a user travel to a physical location.

name: Networking
description: Services related to the operation, management, or monitoring of computer networks.

name: News
description: Services that provide information about current events or developments in areas of interest such as politics, entertainment, business, science, technology, and so on.

name: Other
description: Services that do not clearly fit into another category.

name: Peer-to-peer File Sharing
description: Services that facilitate file sharing by distributing tasks or workloads between peers.

name: Photo
description: Services for discovering, editing, accessing, storing, and sharing images.

name: Productivity
description: Services that help increase productivity such as time, task, or project management.

name: Remoting
description: Services that provide VPN, proxy, remote desktop, remote control, or remote management.

name: Security Software
description: Services that provide protection against intrusion and unauthorized use of data, networks or devices.

name: Shopping
description: Services that support the activity of shopping.

name: Social
description: Services that connect people by means of text, voice, photo, or video that contribute to community development and social interaction.

name: Software Updates
description: Services that facilitate the process of replacing a product with a newer version of the same product.

name: Video
description: Services for discovering, watching, recording, performing, or composing video.
